ticket.title: Rails 3 link_to :method=> :delete doesn't work correctly in Internet Explorer 8
ticket.original-body:
<%= link_to 'Destroy', user, :confirm => 'Are you sure?', :method => :delete %> when the confirm dialog shows, the request has already posted and the destroy action is called, so the ok or cancel button have no effect, the record is always deleted,and i found out the request method is "post" not "delete".
this works fine in firefox
<%= csrf_meta_tag %> already in my layout file
